name: contract.codex-registry
description: Contracts for Codex Protocol's Codex Registry

scripts.copy: cp build/contracts/CodexTitle.json build/contracts/CodexTitleProxy.json build/contracts/CodexCoin.json build/contracts/ERC900BasicStakeContainer.json $PWD/../npm.ethereum-service/static/contracts-source/5777 && npm run build-ethereum-service
scripts.copy:staging: cp build/contracts/CodexTitle.json build/contracts/CodexTitleProxy.json build/contracts/ERC900BasicStakeContainer.json $PWD/../npm.ethereum-service/static/contracts-source/4 && npm run build-ethereum-service
scripts.copy:production: cp build/contracts/CodexTitle.json build/contracts/CodexTitleProxy.json build/contracts/ERC900BasicStakeContainer.json $PWD/../npm.ethereum-service/static/contracts-source/1 && npm run build-ethereum-service
scripts.migrate: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network ganache && npm run copy
scripts.migrate:reset: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network ganache && npm run copy
scripts.migrate:staging: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network rinkeby && npm run copy:staging
scripts.migrate:reset:staging: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network rinkeby && npm run copy:staging
scripts.migrate:production: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network mainnet && npm run copy:production
scripts.migrate:reset:production: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network mainnet && npm run copy:production
scripts.test:title: truffle test --network ganache ./test/token/CodexTitle.test.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol

author: Codex Protocol <contact@codexprotocol.com>
